segments.text: My attention is drawn to the center-left of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing on a two-step stool there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed and tilted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It truly appears close to tipping backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet labeled 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep inside, grabbing cookies, I imagine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate with his other hand, perhaps to catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, looking up at him expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole operation is quite risky, considering the precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he doesn't lose his balance and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him tumbling down is quite unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, but with added danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
